name: add_tags
example_comment: The above snippet adds the `arm` tag to the <%= doc_class_name  %>, if it's not already present.
description: Adds one or more **`string`** tags to a <%= doc_class_name  %>.
This allows it to interact with the `has_tag()` and `find_child_nodes_with_tags()` functions.

parameters.name: tag_list
parameters.desc: A list of tags you want to apply to this <%= doc_class_name  %>.
